attributes.action: Stop the NHS from becoming part of a Brexit related trade deal with the US.
attributes.additional_details:
We call on the government and all opposition to make sure that this has not, and will not become an option.

There are many excellent articles, shows and documentaries on why many suffer in the UK if other countries gain control over the NHS. 

The interview with Woody Johnson was on the BBC's The Andrew Marr Show.

Patriot Act with Hasan Minhaj on Netflix has an excellent episode on the way that drugs pricing is inflated beyond many desperate American's budgets in the name of profit.
attributes.background: US Ambassador to the UK Woody Johnson appeared on the BBC to say that he believes our National Health Service would become part of a Brexit related trade deal between the US and the UK.
